data.title: St. Louis Blues
data.meta_description: The official National Hockey League website including news, rosters, stats, schedules, teams, and video.
data.text:
The local TV home of the St. Louis Blues continues to be Bally Sports. John Kelly and Jamie Rivers call the action. Blues telecasts are available on TV and via the Bally Sports app.

Fans can visit GetMyHomeTeams.com to see options for getting Bally Sports in their area. In St. Louis, those options include DirecTV, DirecTV Stream, Fubo, Spectrum and more.

In addition, fans can now watch Blues games with a subscription to Bally Sports+, the stand-alone streaming service that provides direct access to Blues hockey.

Marquee NHL matchups will air nationally on TNT throughout the season, the network's fourth year covering the NHL.

NHL on TNT games are also available to stream on Max through the Bleacher Report (B / R) Sports Add-On.
